name: Rapid7 Cookbooks
body:
### Welcome to Rapid7 Cookbooks.
### Cookbooks
* [DRb][] - A cookbook which will, by default, configure a DRb server to be vulnerable to Metasploit's drb_remote_codeexec module.
* [DVWA][] - A cookbook to install Damn Vulnerable Web App in either standalone form or over XAMPP.
* [Mirror][] - Configures a node as a git/hg repository mirror
* [Unsafe Umask][] - Configures Ubuntu to have an unsafe umask
* [WAVSEP][] - Recipes to install the Web Application Vulnerability Scanner Evaluation Project on a web server running Tomcat
* [Windows Security][] - Recipes to configure ASLR, DEP, and other Windows configuration options
* [XAMPP][] - Recipes to install the XAMPP web server on a node

### Authors and Contributors
@ecarey-r7's the sole contributor right now, but his teammates at @Rapid7 will be joining him in the culinary goodness soon.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with any of the cookbooks in under @Rapid7-Cookbooks? You can ask @ecarey-r7 (@ipwnstuff) about it, he loves getting feedback.

[DRb]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/drb "DRb Cookbook"
[DVWA]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/dvwa "Damn Vulnerable Web Application Cookbook"
[Mirror]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/mirror "Mirror Cookbook"
[Unsafe Umask]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/unsafe_umask "Unsafe Umask Cookbook"
[WAVSEP]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/wavsep "WAVSEP Cookbook"
[Windows Security]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/windows-security "Windows Security Cookbook"
[XAMPP]: https://github.com/rapid7-cookbooks/xampp "XAMPP Cookbook"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
